thumb.title: 【UTAUカバー】メランコリック 【Nyaonix】
thumb.description: Download the new MMD Model! https://www.mediafire.com/file/9wn0a9... ALSO there is an update to Nyaonix Append with 3 new vocal modes!! Download here! https://nyaonix.uwu.ai/#dlc Melancholic is like one of my most favorite song ever and was actually the first song I covered on this channel so this is all full circle! I hope you all enjoy this cover!! Thank you all for such a successful first year for Nyaonix!! I love you all so much and thank you for helping me make my dreams come true!!! BIG THANKS TO ‪ ‪@_HarryMMD‬ FOR RENDERING THIS FOR ME AND MAKING THIS AMAZING MODEL!! HE DID SO GOOD PLEASE CHECK HIM OUT! ₊˚⊹♡ I'm also a vtuber and you can check me out on all of my socials! https://nyaonix.uwu.ai/ ₊˚⊹♡ Credits ₊˚⊹♡ Song: Melancholic - Junky UST: LUCIFER Model: ☆ Sega/Craft Egg/Colorful Palette/‪Harry Stage: ☆ Sega/Dan1024 Motion: ☆ Sega/Minmode/Seto Effects: ☆ GABAkun/Harigane/Beamman-P/ikeno/Watari/ましまし/KH40/Sovoro/chestnutscoop/Chips
